commit_message:

Update 2-markduplicates.sh

minor change to script format

Update 1-mapping_bowtie2.sh

Removing unnecessary argument "S". No longer used in samtools to define SAM as the input file format.

First upload of the 4-peak script

Update 3-wigfiles.sh

Changed errors in file format/name

Update 1-mapping_bowtie2.sh

Changed the argument "view" to "sort" to fix error on line 86 "`samtools index: failed to create index for "/mnt/scratch/c1831460/ChIP/bowtie/Col-O-Input_S3.sorted.bam": No such file or directory"

Errors and uploads

First upload of 2-markduplicates.sh and 3-wigfiles.sh. Also fixed a bug in 1-mapping_bowtie2.sh that was causing an error on line 89 due to wrong file path

Update 1-mapping_bowtie2.sh

to ensure that sorted.stats.txt files are placed in the bowtie folder with sorted.bam files

Update 1-mapping_bowtie2.sh

finished first version of mapping code
